name: CASE_CONTACT_INFO
description: This table contains information about the case contacts.

columns.name: CASE_ID
columns.description: The internal ID of the case record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: This is a numeric representation of the date of this encounter in your system. The integer portion of the number specifies the date of the encounter. The digits after the decimal point indicate multiple visits on one day.

columns.name: CONTACT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The contact type category ID for the case event.

columns.name: CONTACT_SEVERITY_C_NAME
columns.description: The contact severity category ID for the case event.

columns.name: REVIEWED_BY_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.
